channel.title: Need help with drops please!
channel.description:
well im using a devolution based server and i am having trouble with drops well ill explain
me and my cousin where at godwars using multi combat to kill general graador and he said he wasnt getting and drop's. so the next time he spawned i let my cousin kill him even with me not attacking him i still got the drop and my cousin didnt? this happening everytime he kills something even when im not there i still get the drop and he dosent ??
:confused: im really confused and im not sure how to fix this if anyone could help it would be appreciated
please try and help
-sam
